descriptions: Student does not attempt to round to the nearest 10, or demonstrates a complete lack of understanding of place value.
Student attempts to round to the nearest 10 but makes significant errors, indicating a limited understanding of place value.
Student can round some numbers to the nearest 10 but makes frequent errors or hesitates, showing a partial understanding of place value.
Student consistently rounds numbers to the nearest 10 with only minor errors, demonstrating a basic understanding of place value.
Student accurately rounds numbers to the nearest 10 with ease and demonstrates a solid understanding of place value.
Student expertly rounds numbers to the nearest 10, clearly understands place value, and can explain the reasoning behind the rounding process.
Student does not attempt to round to the nearest 100, or demonstrates a complete lack of understanding of place value.
Student attempts to round to the nearest 100 but makes significant errors, indicating a limited understanding of place value.
Student can round some numbers to the nearest 100 but makes frequent errors or hesitates, showing a partial understanding of place value.
Student consistently rounds numbers to the nearest 100 with only minor errors, demonstrating a basic understanding of place value.
Student accurately rounds numbers to the nearest 100 with ease and demonstrates a solid understanding of place value.
Student expertly rounds numbers to the nearest 100, clearly understands place value, and can explain the reasoning behind the rounding process.
Student cannot explain the rounding process or the role of place value.
Student attempts to explain the rounding process but provides an unclear or inaccurate explanation.
Student can explain the rounding process with some prompting but struggles to articulate the role of place value.
Student adequately explains the rounding process and the role of place value in the process.
Student clearly and accurately explains the rounding process, demonstrating a strong understanding of place value.
Student provides a comprehensive and insightful explanation of the rounding process, including the significance of place value and its application in various contexts.
